TopicTitle: Command pods, Probe cores etc become locked in space when activating time warp

Articles.Content: The title sums it up, I have no mods installed at all, and whenever I try to begin time warp the current part I'm controlling via becomes locked in space, causing my craft to explode. This is making the game unplayable, and me a very dissatisfied player. The problem has not been present from the start, and I'm still running 1.0.0 or whatever the release day version was. Any fix for this or do I need to start my career mode again? If I do I'm pretty much just going to drop KSP at this point.
Try updating KSP, your buildID file should say 842, I have experienced the bug you mention and it's fixed in the latest version.
Yes, I even had a save from .25 and that still works ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I have build ID file 842, and I experienced this failure while warping to node around the Mun. Reloaded and repeated a bunch of times and it didn't happen again.
Okay if it does reoccur please post your game logs, we'll need them for a bug report.
No worries will keep this one in mind for you....
